Title: KTool
Description:
Ktool is a tool for learning japanese kanji for student.
It doesn't include a dictionary, student should add word that they are learning by themselves.

Code in WPF, .NET 4.0
HomeWiki:
I'm adding new function for KTool: Hiragana test. The screen will display kanji word and require you to enter this kanji in hiragana. It's ready to use if you download the source code and build the program for your own. But I have to make sure this function has no stupid bug before release it ^^ You can see the preview of this function below:
